text: Maddock Films Pvt. Ltd. is an Indian production house founded by film director and producer Dinesh Vijan. Established in 2010, the Maddock Films Pvt. Ltd. has produced critically and commercially acclaimed Hindi films that include, Love Aaj Kal (2009) Cocktail (2012), Badlapur (2015), Hindi Medium (2017), Stree (2018), Luka Chuppi (2019) and Bala (2019). ==Films produced== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" ! scope="col" | No ! scope="col" | Year ! scope="col" | Film ! scope="col" | Cast ! scope="col" | Director(s) ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | Notes ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | |- | 1 || 2005 || Being Cyrus || || Homi Adajania || English film || |- | 2 || 2008 || Hijack || || Kunal Shivdasani || || |- | 3 || 2009 || Love Aaj Kal || || Imtiaz Ali || || |- | 4 || rowspan="2"|2012 || Agent Vinod || || Sriram Raghavan || || |- | 5 || Cocktail || || Homi Adajania || || |- | 6 || 2013 || Go Goa Gone || || Raj and D.K. || || |- | 7 || rowspan="3"|2014 || Lekar Hum Deewana Dil || || Arif Ali || || |- | 8 || Finding Fanny || || Homi Adajania || || |- | 9 || Happy Ending || || Raj and D.K. || || |- | 10 || 2015 || Badlapur || || Sriram Raghavan || || |- | 11 || rowspan="2"|2017 || Hindi Medium || || Saket Chaudhary || || |- | 12 || Raabta || || Dinesh Vijan || || |- | 13 || 2018 || Stree || || Amar Kaushik || || |- | 14 || rowspan="4"|2019 || Luka Chuppi || || Laxman Utekar || || |- | 15 || Arjun Patiala || || Rohit Jugraj Chauhan || || |- | 16 || Made In China || || Mikhil Musale || || |- | 17 || Bala || || Amar Kaushik || || |- | 18 || rowspan="5"|2020 || Love Aaj Kal 2 || || Imtiaz Ali || || |- | 19 || Angrezi Medium || || Homi Adajania || || |- | 20 || Roohi Afzana || || Hardik Mehta || || |- | 21 || Mimi || || Laxman Utekar || || |- | 22 || Shiddat || || Kunal Deshmukh || || |- | 23 || 2021 || Go Goa Gone 2 || || Raj and D.K. || || |- |} ==References== Category:2010 establishments in India Category:Film production companies of India
